title: Electron energy-angle distributions 100 eV - 30 keV, often at 24 sec, EESA High, Wind 3DP - R. Lin/S. Bale (UC Berkeley)

parameters.name: FLUX
parameters.description: Electron number flux 100eV-30keV in 15 energy and 8 angle bins (as energy-pitch angle displays)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA
parameters.description: Electron number flux 100eV-30keV at 8 pitch angles as spectrograms by energy. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['FLUX']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_DISPLAY_TYPE: bar_charty=ENERGY_filled,z=FLUX_byE_atA(1,*), z=FLUX_byE_atA(2,*), z=FLUX_byE_atA(3,*), z=FLUX_byE_atA(4,*), z=FLUX_byE_atA(5,*), z=FLUX_byE_atA(6,*), z=FLUX_byE_atA(7,*), z=FLUX_byE_atA(8,*)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA0
parameters.description: Electron number flux 100eV-30keV as a stack_plot of 15 energies at the Bin1 angle (often ~15 deg. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['FLUX']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: PANGLE
parameters.description: Time-varying pitch angles for 8 angular bins

parameters.name: ENERGY_filled
parameters.description: ---> Time-varying electron energies for 15 channels. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function fix_sparse (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['ENERGY']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: VSW
parameters.description: SW Velocity vector (from ions and ground-based processing)

parameters.name: MAGF
parameters.description: Vector magnetic field

parameters.name: TIME
parameters.description: UNIX Time (secs since 1 Jan 1970)
